title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge (algebra, calculus, statistics)
context.additional_context: Learners immerse themselves in a case-based simulation environment to solve real-world mathematical problems encountered in the workplace, performing problem-based learning (PBL) in a VR-enabled collaborative learning space.

learning_goals: Learners independently analyze and summarize mathematical concepts using pre-learning materials (videos, readings) provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners mathematically model real-world business cases through PBL workshops and derive optimal solutions using simulation tools.
Learners effectively communicate with peers in VR-based collaborative spaces, present solutions to complex mathematical problems, and incorporate feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
